v1.19.0.description: fixes an issue where an autoplaying carousel will play while a CTA inside of a slide is focused

changed having multi and single slide carousel code co-mingled and duplicated carousel code in other modules. Carousel is now deprecated an either MultiSlideCarousel or SingleSlideCarousel should be used in its place

v1.18.0.description: fixes an issue where the touch swipe not working when a user swipes diagonally

v1.16.0.description: fixes tracking item focus and show/hiding flippers in gallery mode

v1.15.0.description: fixes an issue where the flipper arrows do not work when screen width is less than the width of the content
fixes an issue where the carousel can scroll beyond the end of the single slide content if the content width changes due to carousel resizing

v1.14.0.description: adds pub/sub support so subscribers can receive slide change notifications

v1.13.0.description: updates multi-slide carousels with tab/tabpanel roles to enhance accessibility
